title: Development of the Tony Towns-Whitley website and health care.
subtitle: The healthcare system (HealthCare.gov) was developed on the basis of a non-bid contract at a cost of over $634 million by a Canadian company that donated $47 million to the Obama campaign.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: The health-care system was developed on the basis of a no-bid contract at a cost of over $634 million by a Canadian company selected because it donated $47 million to the Obama campaign and hired Michelle Obama's colleague as senior executive.
